website_summaries.verdict: You've heard of Stanley knives, now try Stanley scissors. These sturdy scissors come from a trusted brand and are surprisingly affordable.
pros: Long-lasting steel blades are sharp, cut precisely, and hold their edge
The ergonomic rubber grip is comfortable to use for long periods
Users love how easy it is to adjust the blade tension to suit your cutting needs
cons: Some users report the pivot pin can come loose with heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Looked like heavy duty scissors but the first time I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked like heavy duty scissors but the first time I tried to cut something a little thick, it broke. The center piece that holds the scissors together is made of cheap plastic. If you’re looking for scissors for tough jobs, but elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: lea boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: These scissors are good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with these scissors. They have stayed sharp even after cutting a lot of paper. I also like the padded handle as I have pain in my hands putting any pressure on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: All edges are sharp, not just cutting edges.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for opening plastic packages thati can't simply tear open to get at my merchandise. I can tell you these things are sharp, because I've been cut on my hands from non cutting edges three times now. Just be careful with these. All edges are sharp and can cut you, not just the blade edges. Pick them up by the handle only, not the blades, even if the blades are closed.
customer_reviews.author: PsychoPro

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday scissor, sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I got these scissors to keep in my kitchen for everyday tasks. I got them as an add-on item and I think I paid around $8 for 2 pair, a pretty good price I thought. They are comfortable in my hand and the blade is very sharp. I am happy with the purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for just some household scissors and these are great!! They are sharp and easy to use. I have arthritis in my hands so scissors can be painful, but not these!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be pretty good, sturdy scissors
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be pretty good, sturdy scissors. I keep one in the kitchen as shears and another in the "tool/junk drawer". I noticed what I thought was food on one after like 6 weeks but believe it to be rust which is unfortunate. I didn't buy them thinking they were rust-proof or anything though so no biggie. Good price on a pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Poston

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of utility scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are a decent pair of scissors, especially for the price. I like to have three or four pairs of scissors in my kitchen drawer and these fit the bill. Amazon asked me to rate them on durability which I simply cannot do as they only arrived this week.
customer_reviews.author: for the birds

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect much from these scissors at first. But I was pleasantly surprised when I easily cut through childproof plastic on some toys. The scissors were sharp and did the job. They were also comfortable on my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Mary526

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong
customer_reviews.text: Pivot is plastic and mine broke in not so hard use. Probably fine for light paper work. Investing a little more for a metal pivot this time. We all need to stop buying throwaway products. Saves money, helps next generations.
customer_reviews.author: Pw Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Is scissors work very well especially when you consider the price.
customer_reviews.text: These Stanley 8 in all-purpose scissors perform better than other brands of this type of scissors in this price range in my opinion. I think they work great as a pair of all-around scissors that are sharp and seem to be very durable. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: BigJim

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within months of purchase
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using these scissors for a few months. Used them today to cut a plastic zip tie and they fell apart. The middle of the scissors has what appears to be a metal screw but when they fell apart, it was easy to see that there is no metal screw. The only thing holding the scissors together is a piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Baer

customer_reviews.title: Very good basic scissors for a good price
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are great for around the house, every day use. They are sharp and have a sturdiness to them. They are not meant for heavy duty use. One pair was a little tight but I just loosened the screw a bit and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting these to be so large, heavy and durable. They cut well, and feel tight when cutting. For the price, you can't beat these. I haven't had these very long, so I will edit this review if they end up failing prematurely.
customer_reviews.author: Vanya

customer_reviews.title: All around good!
customer_reviews.text: I know buying scissors isnt glamorous, but these are a great buy! Whether you are using them for light kitchen work, crafts or general use, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T.

customer_reviews.title: Best all around scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Great for utility work. Fits nicely in my hands. I have very big hands. Haven't broken or worn out a pair in two years.
customer_reviews.author: zion

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than I needed but that’s my fault for not paying attention. Nice thick and sturdy scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scissors
customer_reviews.text: Well made very sturdy scissors. I kept buying the cheap O's and breaking them. Not these and the grip is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These weren't comfortable at first, but I quickly got used to them and now they are just fine. They cut well too.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Like They Should
customer_reviews.text: Good value for “economy” minded scissors. Two pack is handy as these tend to sprout legs and walk away ... actually bought two - two packs for this price.
customer_reviews.author: TStech

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used for Cutting everything. I have arthritis and I can still use these scissors easily. Like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Good all-purpose shears
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these scissors. Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good scissors
customer_reviews.text: Good scissors. They get the job done. Didn’t really need two. Would have preferred the option of just buying one
customer_reviews.author: Nina S

customer_reviews.title: Nice sizzors.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sizzors. Just a little heftier than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: AVERAGE SISSORS
customer_reviews.text: Nothing exceptional about these scissors. Comfort is average and cutting is average.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: WOW., what a bargain and such quality, comfortable, sharp, such a deal
customer_reviews.author: KCLOU

customer_reviews.title: These are nice! They cut well
customer_reviews.text: These are nice! They cut well, and effortlessly. I cut through some picture-hanging wire with very little effort, but only because it was the only cutting tool available. I wouldn't use it for that all the time, but it worked well when I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Scissors dull.
customer_reviews.text: The scissors seem very dull. I have old scissors that cut better than these. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Visa

customer_reviews.title: High quality scissors for everyday.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easy grip scissors for everyday use. Also, varied in length for easy use in different situations.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all purpose scissors!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all purpose scissors, sharp, nice feel and well made. I got the 2 pack and use one in my office and the other for the garage. Worked with everything I have thrown at it. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi Kobayashi

customer_reviews.title: Previously I could never find my scissors when needed
customer_reviews.text: Quality scissors at an excellent price. Now I don't have to hunt for scissors when needed.... I keep one in the kitchen and one in the office.
customer_reviews.author: SkyKingCFI

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are great scissors. They stay sharp and cut through just about anything. Love them. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: William Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Works on paper only
customer_reviews.text: These cut paper....and only paper. I tried to cut a think sheet and it wouldn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Nice standard scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are very standard scissors. They feel high-quality and are comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Live.Laugh.Love.

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as I'd hoped in terms of quality and cutting ability, but they are fine for the 'around the house' jobs.
customer_reviews.author: B. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Not very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Theses are below average when it comes to cutting sharpness. You get what you pay for I guess. It'll be a back-up pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mike from Houston

customer_reviews.title: Good utility scissors
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Cut through a lot of aluminum tabs no problem and no damage to blades
customer_reviews.author: SizeKingTx

customer_reviews.title: cheap, and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: halfway decent shears at a very good price. Don't expect to do any precision cutting with these suckers, strictly for cutting paper and opening packages. Will probably break in a few years, but you're still getting more than you paid for...
customer_reviews.author: M Dominic Donner

customer_reviews.title: Good general purpose scissors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and the first week one pair came unhinged. I contacted Amazon and they sent replacements. The second pair seems to be fine. They seem well made and are working fine.
customer_reviews.author: DMA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fitwell very sharp They'll last a very long time Price very good
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors at a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable scissors that do exactly what they're supposed to, and at a great price. I highly recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: excellent! they cut very well. I am so glad I threw away Wescott's scissors.
customer_reviews.author: PuppyTalk

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Cheap handles , only good for light materials. The handle stops bypass each other when you push hard.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sindlaire

customer_reviews.title: Good set of scissors for work and home
customer_reviews.text: Great scissors. They are sharp and durable. I have big hands and my fingers don’t get stuck in the handle like most other scissors. 4 star is above average and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: These are great scissors
customer_reviews.text: We got three pair...they are exactly as described. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Bush

customer_reviews.title: Used daily in my pool fence construction business, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Used daily in my pool fence construction business. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Scissors are good ones. Glad I bought them. Sharp and easy to cut with.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Feyerabend

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome scissors! They are sharp but so multifunctional! So glad with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: I Fisch

customer_reviews.title: These  are sharp and at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Super deal from Warehouse deals! Finally got scissors that cut. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: E. Constable

customer_reviews.title: Warranty works
customer_reviews.text: Below average quality, one set broke upon first use. 4 stars only because warranty replacement with Stanley was simple and quick to receive a new set.
customer_reviews.author: IndyHockey

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are strong scissors, easy to use. Hopefully they will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and fell sturdy and comfortable on hand
customer_reviews.text: So far impressed, very sharp and comfortable, I use it as all around and kitchen scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Heike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband. The grips are large enough for his hands.
customer_reviews.author: Just us!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product (If used as intended).Great price,Fast delivery..Who could complain
customer_reviews.author: F.Dudly

customer_reviews.title: sturdy for chores in the kitchen...
customer_reviews.text: sturdy for kitchen and projects...beats flimsy scissors...and broken handled scissors....
customer_reviews.author: ram

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, always need a pair of scissors in the kitchen and a pair at the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Titus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: After buying a 4pack of so so Scissors, I bought these and am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: these scissors are great heavy duty scissors for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Klowetter

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and cut good through the full length of the blades
customer_reviews.text: For the price and general purpose use, they work very well. Very sharp and cut good through the full length of the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Dirt

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great scissors in a 2 pack. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Nice grip and good cutting edges. For the price this was a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Lancaster Farms

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Perfect scissor for cutting anything and everything. Fingers of a medium sized female hand fit in nicely. Colors make it an easy find & grab.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of looking for scissors around the house so I bought 3 pair. These work great, nice and sharp and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: macvere

customer_reviews.title: Five starts
customer_reviews.text: Great scissors. They are sharp yet comfortable. Cuts great and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Elinoff

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, very sharp and they work ...
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, very sharp and they work well for left handed people. Can't beat that price. Thank you Stanley!!!
customer_reviews.author: Online Gamer/Top Tier Geek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great design to help feel less stress when using them.
customer_reviews.author: Tsuisato

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in my hand
customer_reviews.text: The 1st pair I went to use fell apart in my hand as soon as I opened the blades. The 2nd pair seems to be alright.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong scissors, not that flimsy kind that falls apart fast. Ergonomic handle.
customer_reviews.author: VOX.LA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are incredible. lExceds my expectaions for a heavey duty pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scissors for us
customer_reviews.text: Perfect scissors for us. I got them to have in the house. I want to durable strong scissors and they were exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Desk and general household tasks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Desk and general household tasks. Would be again.
customer_reviews.author: Don Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Quality pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty scissors. I've only had them for a day but have used them quite a bit already and I can't foresee any problems with them. The handle is comfortable and they open up enough for me to open some cardboard packages we had delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Stanley 8 Inch All-Purpose Ergonomic Scissor, Pack of 2 (SCI8EST-2PK), Assorted Colors
product_meta.description:
The legendary Stanley quality and performance for your everyday cutting needs.



Long-lasting, wear-resistant stainless steel blades are constructed with a defined blade edge for smooth, accurate cutting. Precise blade tip delivers crisp, clean cuts during general use while thick, heavy-duty blades effortlessly slice through difficult materials. Ergonomic handle with cushioned internal finger loops include a soft grip finger rest for additional precision control and comfortable use. Blade tension is easily adjusted for customizable cutting needs. Includes two all-purpose ergonomic scissors in assorted colors (specific colors not guaranteed).
feature_bullets: Long lasting wear-resistant stainless steel blades
Thick, robust blade effortlessly cuts through tough materials
Comfortable ergonomic handle with a soft, cushioned grip
Defined blade edge for smooth, accurate cutting
Precision blade tip delivers consistent crisp, clean cuts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars279 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
